biotools.summary: Program that does targeted characterisation of short structural variation. It can be used for STR analysis, or any other type of targeted analysis. It characterises any variation between a set of user-defined markers.

bioschemas.name: TSSV
bioschemas.summary: Program that does targeted characterisation of short structural variation. It can be used for STR analysis, or any other type of targeted analysis. It characterises any variation between a set of user-defined markers.
